name: Some sort of dungeon game
description:
Made for the Stop Waiting for Godot jam. Really small, there's only one level! Thanks for playing! :)

Controls:

  • Q/E or mouselook: Look Left/Right
  • WASD - Move
  • Z - Fight mode
  • X - Interact mode
  • C - Pick Up mode
  • I - Open/close inventory
  • Left click or Enter - Fight/Interact/Pick up and Select dialogue option (left click only)
  • R - Restart

Made by grevs: https://twitter.com/grevsoft

Made with Godot Engine: godotengine.org/license

Bitty font by Mash Arcade: https://masharcade.itch.io/bitty

MarshMellow32 palette by FormalPrejudice: https://lospec.com/palette-list/marshmellow32
